title: Best champion to one trick?
body: Who do you think is the best champion  to one trick? There are lots of people that do one tricks, TF, master yi, riven are just a few that I've seen. But given the ever shifting style  and meta changes who do you thing sustains the best through it? I don't get to play a lot and I've always loved the idea of mastering one champ. I'll play mid,top or adc no preference for  role really.
